body:
Seems like this is the main error: 
`In file included from /Users/Leo/pytorch/caffe2/operators/stats_put_ops.cc:1:
/Users/Leo/pytorch/caffe2/operators/stats_put_ops.h:41:31: error: use of
      overloaded operator '*' is ambiguous (with operand types 'at::Half' and
      'const int64_t' (aka 'const long long'))
    int64_t int_value = input * magnitude_expand_;`
Everything from there are all errors.
